department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Request for a standing offer for Architectural services in the National Capital Region
description: Inviting desired bidders to pre-qualify for the aforementioned standing offer
full_summary:
===============

### Call for Architectural Services - Standing Offer

**Notice ID**
=============

*EP168-240494-Architecture Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)*

### Tender Details
-----------------

* **Reference Number**: WS4201725463-Doc4211341066
* **Tender Number**: WS4201725463
* **Publication Date**: 2023-09-13
* **Closing Date**: 2023-11-09T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-11-07

### Contract Information
-------------------------

* **Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-01
* **Contract End Date**: 2025-12-31

### Procurement Overview
-------------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified Architectural and Engineering firms to submit proposals for a Standing Offer to provide Architecture Services. This procurement follows a one-phase submission process.

### Required Services
----------------------

The selected consultants will provide a range of services for Architectural projects in the National Capital Region (NCR), including:

* Architecture services as identified in the Required Services section of this document

### Standing Offer Terms
-------------------------

* Up to six (6) Standing Offers may be authorized for a period of two (2) years from the date of issuance
* Extensions may be available for up to three (3) additional one-year periods under the same conditions and rates

### Evaluation Criteria
-------------------------

The selection criteria for this procurement are:

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Contact Information
-------------------------

For more information, please contact:

Steve Bourassa
Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
steve.bourassa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Language and Format
-------------------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

### Submission Guidelines
-------------------------

Late submissions will not be considered.

### Accessibility and Accommodation
------------------------------

PWGSC is committed to providing accessible services. If you require accommodations to participate in this procurement, please contact the contracting authority.

### Information Source
-------------------------

For more information, please visit: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17440911

### Important Dates
-------------------

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-09T14:00:00
*
